name: Costs & Impacts
title: SalmonState On How To Help Storm-Impacted Western Alaska
description: Our hearts are with our friends in western Alaska who have been impacted by last weekend’s devastating storms. In true Alaskan fashion, people have rallied to help in a huge way, sending donations of clothing, dry goods, and other necessary items, and donating money to help toward recovery. One person is confirmed dead from the storms, two are missing, and more than 1,000 are displaced. Dozens of houses floated away from their foundations, sometimes with people in them, ending up miles from where they started. At least 15 villages in the Yukon-Kuskokwim Delta region were impacted.

title: During my time as EPA Regional Administrator under the Biden-Harris administration, I had the distinct pleasure and honor of meeting U.S. Navy Admiral Alvin Holsey, commander of U.S. Southern Command‚Ä¶ | Daniel Blackman
description:
During my time as EPA Regional Administrator under the Biden-Harris administration, I had the distinct pleasure and honor of meeting U.S. Navy Admiral Alvin Holsey, commander of U.S. Southern Command (SOUTHCOM). We spoke about many things ‚Äî including his plans on recruitment and partnering with institutions around the country, and even creating opportunities to engage entrepreneurs interested in contracting with the Navy through their procurement process.

I say all that to say: this is absolutely disheartening. When you have served in the federal government and know the character of the people who often become mere headlines to others, it becomes very clear that something is deeply wrong within our country.

Admiral Holsey, a man of honor and integrity, will be stepping down at the end of this year ‚Äî two years ahead of schedule according to the announcement by Pete Hegseth, the Secretary of Defense. 

He is one of only two Black four-star officers leading a U.S. combatant command. 
‚Äî
His departure comes amid escalating tensions in the Caribbean, specifically with Venezuela. 
‚Äî

üá∫üá∏ 
This is bigger than politics. When good men ‚Äî a few good men ‚Äî step down from service to their country, we should all be concerned.

(Articles in comments)
